properties.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 7:57PM EST until January 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Muhlenberg...
Ohio.

.Heavy rain over the last several hours will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Rochester.
* from Tuesday morning to Wednesday morning.
* At  6:00 AM Monday the stage was 15.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Tuesday morning and continue
to rise to near 17.2 feet by Tuesday evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 17.0 feet...Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed.
KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2
feet on Feb 24 2015.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
